review: Half the games don't work without the game controller, which is sold separately and takes months to get.  It is difficult to leave my son to watch videos (through amazon as all video playback requires parental controls pin, every time that he wants to change the video (this means I have to make him leave the room in order to enter it).. It would be nicer if you could set up a list of acceptable videos so that they can choose... Some apps listed as "rated for everyone" like the shark game has some inappropriate content like eating humans.  The vocal search does not work with Netflix. If you use it, it takes you to Amazon.  Games bought for the Kindle Fire HDX may not work on the Amazon Fire TV and so the educational apps that we have for his kindle can not be set up to play through the Fire TV, which is frustrating..
author: Drevik "aka Drevik"
